channel.title: How do you change EXP gain rate for attack,strength,and defence?
channel.description: Yea I really need to know this, no one ever answers it, somone please answer, after this my server will be complete.

item.title: How do you change EXP gain rate for attack,strength,and defence?
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

ok case is just a word. No such thing as case Id. Either log onto your server and right click there will be an id number. OR go to mopar webclient and go to help > object Ids. Type the name of an object in and it will tell you.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change EXP gain rate for attack,strength,and defence?

item.title: How do you change EXP gain rate for attack,strength,and defence?
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Find Some Xp"); setAnimation(422); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 15; }

Well, At the you will see Case 823. Switch 823 with the object id of what you want to change the Xp rate of. then search for it like case #### Then once you find it, the Number after addSkillXP(( Is what you want to change. 10000 is pretty fast and i recommend about 8000.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change EXP gain rate for attack,strength,and defence?
